name: Bain Antillais (Marinade For Two To Three Pounds Of Fish And Seafood)
description: All fish and seafood, except salt cod, tends to be marinated in this sort of mixture before any kind of cooking, whether stewing, as above, or grilling.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 fresh hot pepper, deveined, seeded and minced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a noncorrodible bowl. Add the fish or seafood and marinate for one to two hours.
